main.name: Craig Farrell
main.description: I'm looking for a challenge and environment in which I can excel
main.bio: I've done many things since leaving school, yet I've never found something which satifies my drive for problem solving and being creative. Recently completing a Physics degree with The Open University taught me that I crave learning new things and consistenly challenging myself. Problem solving is what I'm meant to be doing. The School of Code has given me the chance to propel myself into a career which feels like a match made in heaven.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out if you 'd like to talk

resume.skillmessage: Here are some of the coding languagues and technologies I have worked with...

education.description: I spent 2 1/2 years of my University education both travelling and living in South Korea. Most of all this taught me self motivation and time management. I also learnt some Qunatum Physics and did some writing about the possibilities of Quantum Teleportation too

I learnt many technologies from React and C# to deployment methods and containerisation. But most importantly I learned how best to break down problems in manageable chuncks and improved my capabilities as a problem solver.

work.title: Inside Sales Manager
work.description: I leveraged my management experience to transform a solo sales effort into a team of 5 sales professionals, working and growing together.

work.title: Owner
work.description: Redirected business strategy within first 3 months of stewardship, understanding a better gap was present in the market, and took this opportunity to grow the business and improve prospects, for new employees.

testimonials.text: I started working with Craig in Jan of 2019 when I started working for Click Travel. I had never worked in the travel industry before and straight away Craig made me feel welcome and helped ease me into a new sector. His managerial skills are second to none. He understands and listens to everything he is told and uses his vast knowledge on how to maybe change the smallest of things for the biggest difference. I have worked with many managers during my career and have never come across anyone with his level of understanding, knowledge, and compassion. his willingness to learn and improve his skill set means he is the ideal candidate for any role

I would have absolutely no hesitation in recommending Craig. Not only is he everything you would want in your team, hardworking, committed and driven, I have witnessed first hand how he uses his passion and energy to create new teams, drive results and truly lead by example. Craig has an intelligent mindset and an amazing ability to interpret complex tasks / projects and position them in simpler terms to help understanding and gain buy-in from those around him. Wherever Craig goes next, I am confident he will be a great success and you will be very lucky to have him as part of your team
